translations.text: By the night as it settles—
your Lord has not abandoned yousg , nor has He despised(you) .
And indeed the Last is better for yousg than the First,
and your Lord will certainly give you so that you will be well pleased.
Did He not find yousg an orphan, so He sheltered(you) ;
and found you wandering, so He guided(you) ;
and found you in need, so He enriched(you) ?
So as for the orphan, dosg not subdue;
and as for the asker, do not rebuke;
and as for the blessing of your Lord, do talk about it.
